comments:
Ed, as I discussed in my e-mail, can we suppress this specific message?

Users have been complaining about this and associating this problem with
our editor/tools.

Thanks.

org.xml.sax.SAXParseException: Relative URI "XMLSchema.dtd"; can not be 
resolved without a base URI.

Crimson has other problems too, such as Element.hasAttributeNS(null, "x") gets a
null pointer exception.  As such, we can't support Crimson and so we provide
instructions for how to replace Crimson with a parser that works properly.

(In reply to comment #1)
> Crimson has other problems too, such as Element.hasAttributeNS(null, "x") gets a
> null pointer exception.  As such, we can't support Crimson and so we provide
> instructions for how to replace Crimson with a parser that works properly.

Where is this instruction published?
*** Bug 91763 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
